Go Back Review Name: Delightful Review Description: purchased this product last week. product is nice but the installation amount mentioned here costed alot to me. charged alot for extra pipe 750 for a metre is hell alot compared if you go to market price 250 per meter. think twice before installing this as you might end up burning alot of bucks. over-all I would say installation charges are quite high tough I got a good deal in flipkart but still it's costing alot
